long long unsigned int dig[]={9,180,2700,36000,450000,5400000,63000000,720000000,8100000000,90000000000,990000000000,10800000000000,117000000000000,1260000000000000,13500000000000000};
int main()
{  int t;
     scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        long long int i,n,k,num;i=0;
        scanf("%lld%lld",&n,&k);
        while(k>0)
        {
            k-=dig[i++];
        }
        if(k==0)
        {printf("9\n");continue;}k+=dig[i-1];
        if(k%i==0)
            printf("%lld\n",((long long int)pow(10,i-1)+k/i-1)%10);
        else
        {   num=pow(10,i-1)+k/i;
            num=(num/(long long int)pow(10,i-(k%i)))%10;
            printf("%lld\n",num);
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
